sentences.sentence: Why does hormone replacement therapy (HRT) with estrogens (e) plus progestins (p) increase the risk of breast cancer?
sentences.translation: 为何雌激素(E)加孕激素(P)的激素替代疗法(HRT)可增加妇女患乳腺癌的危险呢？

sentences.sentence: Methods: The human hormone-dependent breast cancer cell lines MCF-7 were cultured with estradiol (E_2) and progestins.
sentences.translation: 方法将人乳腺癌细胞系mcf - 7在加入了雌二醇和孕激素的培养液中进行培养。

sentences.sentence: It is sometimes referred to as "human-identical" or "bio-identical" progesterone, which differentiates it from synthetic progestins or progestogens.
sentences.translation: 它有时被称为“人类相同”或“生物相同的”的孕激素，它区别于合成的孕激素或孕激素。
